fields.text: Cast on the corpse of a slain monster, this raises a skeleton warrior that fights for you.
Creates a golem from the earth to fight by your side.
Synergies: Summon Mastery, Blood Golem, Iron Golem, Fire Golem
Transforms a metallic item into a golem that gains the properties of that item.
Synergies: Summon Mastery, Clay Golem, Blood Golem, Fire Golem
Cast on the corpse of a slain monster, this raises a skeleton mage that fights for you.
Creates a golem that shares with you the life it steals.
Synergies: Summon Mastery, Clay Golem, Iron Golem, Fire Golem
Creates a golem that converts the damage it receives from fire into life.
Synergies: Summon Mastery, Clay Golem, Blood Golem, Iron Golem
Raise a bow wielding skeleton from the Void  to assist you in maintaining the balance Does not require a corpse and has limited duration.
Reduce the life essence of your minions but cause them to frenzy and cause damage when they explode upon expiration.
Returns a monster to life to fight by your side.
Summons a deadly spike of bone that leaves a burning magic trail non its way to impale your enemies.
Fires a barrage of summoned barbed teeth that knockback enemies.
Synergies: Drain Essence, Bone Spear, Bone Prison, Bone Spirit
Strike you foes with a tainted weapon, to inflict them with disease that spreads to other monsters.
Cast on the corpse of a slain monster, it explodes, damaging nearby enemies.
Cast on the corpse of a slain monster, toxic gas is released that poisons nearby monsters.
Creates a barrier of fossilized bone around your target which drains thier life.
Suck the life and energy force from your enemies restoring life and mana.
Emits an expanding ring of concentrated poison.
Releases a spirit of the restless undead that tracks its target or finds one of its own.
Synergies: Teeth, Bone Spear, Bone Prison
Curse your enemies to reduce their stats reduces are based off points in Ritualistic Practice Skills.
Cast a bewitchment upon you enemies causing them to become vulnuerable.
Cast a Hex on your enemies that lowers their effectiveness.
